resources.string: You can access latest current weather data for any location by click to today icon or double tap on screen.
You can access next 5 day weather forecast data for any location by click to 5 day icon.
You can setup weather data access by location or real time device location by click to setting icon.
Double tap on screen to access by location or real time device location.
Welcome to the weather forecast app.
Weather Forecast app requires location permission!
Cannot get weather data. Please check your network connection!
